#include<bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll power(ll base,ll index)
{
    ll ans=1;
    while(index--)
        ans*=base;
    return ans;
}
int main()
{
    ll sum,n,index,diff,k,add,prev,no,digit,t;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
        no=9;
        digit=1;
        sum=0;
        while(1)
        {
            if(k<=(sum+no*digit))
                break;
            sum+=(no*digit);
            digit++;
            no*=10;
        }
        diff=k-sum;
        add=diff/digit;
        prev=power(10,(digit-1))-1;
        prev=prev+add;
        index=diff%digit;
        ostringstream os;
        if(index==0)
        {
            os<<prev;
            string s=os.str();
            cout<<s.at(digit-1)<<endl;
        }
        else
        {
            os<<prev+1;
            string s=os.str();
            cout<<s.at(index-1)<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
